TextView.android:text: Located near the famous clock tower of Jodhpur, this beautiful candlelit restaurant is known to be the perfect place for a romantic dinner. The small yet glorious eatery offers various Indian culinary delicacies, such as Biriyani, North Indian Curries, and traditional tandoori, which are quite famous among the tourists. However, if you want to savor something that you have never tasted before in your life, then make sure to try out their delightful Laal Maas. Once you are done with your food, you can then, also ask the bartender to hit you up with the shots of gin to make your night more memorable.

With its adorned stone walls and large cane chairs in a green courtyard, the Jhankar Choti Haveli offers an excellent Instagram-worthy ambiance to its visitors. This semi-open-air restaurant is known to serve tempting vegetarian dishes, which will surely steal your heart. Along with this, they also offer delicious baked-cheese dishes, burgers, and plus pizzas at an affordable price, which are also quite popular among the tourists. Considered by many as one of the best restaurants in Jodhpur for vegetarians, it also has a separate air-conditioned section and a rooftop, which offers excellent views.

Sharing premises with a hotel and a serene Rama Temple, Nirvana is considered to be one of the best restaurants in Jodhpur Rajasthan, regarding aesthetics. This restaurant has a rooftop eating area, which offers exquisite panoramic views, and an indoor cafÃ© that is completely covered in Ramayana wall paintings. Therefore, along with eating, you can also click some delightful photos here to make your moments more memorable. Along with stunning views, Nirvana also offers mouth-watering vegetarian foods, which comes with the royal scent of Rajasthan and tastes absolutely delicious. Besides this, they also provide continental meals, which are quite popular among both the locals and the foreigners.
